title: Deep Sea: An Original Graphic Novel
description: A city run on a mysterious new fuel called Sludge finds itself on the brink of collapse after shipments of Sludge stop reaching the shore. What is this new fuel and why has it dried up? Only a privileged few know exactly why and they're desperate to keep the secret from the public.Caught at the heart of this epidemic is a quiet deep sea welder. A cog more interested in getting the job done than the particulars of the job. After discovering the secrets of the city, however, she is unwillingly thrown into the city's energy crisis. Alone, scared, and with child, the welder finds hope and refuge with Amber - a child of the city - unwanted by anyone else. Together they watch as the city crumbles and new life grows from its ashes.Deep Sea is a terrifying tale of industry, progress and the humans who lay its foundation.
author: Ricky Lima
